Welcome to Stitch & Savour

Homemade food and handcrafted crochet products made with love

About Sangita Thakur

At Stitch & Savour, every product tells a story of warmth, care, and creativity. Founded by Sangita Thakur, our venture is built on love for homemade food and the joy of handmade crochet art.

Why Choose Stitch & Savour?

🏠

Homemade & Handmade

Nothing mass-produced. Everything created with care.

🎨

Customizable

Crochet items tailored to your choice of design and color.

🌿

Fresh & Quality

Food items prepared to order for maximum freshness.

❤️

Made with Love

A mother's touch in every recipe and every stitch.

Ready to Experience Homemade Goodness?

Join our community and discover the joy of authentic, handmade products
